ComicInfo.Title: Arthur; The Curse of the Mummy Monkey; The Girl; Cinematographo√∂nomatopoeia; The Artist and the Elves; Rotten to the Core; Cave Wimp; Lully Lulay
ComicInfo.Summary:
An artist tries to get a group of elves to create art.
Jam sequence with characters by their respective creators, this time with a loose theme of various characters heading to a "Zap #12" show in New York City.
Crumb tells the story of the first ectomorph in Neolithic times. Cave Wimp, an outcast of the clan, accidently finds himself in the favor of the alpha males. At least for a little while.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:24:28. [Issue ID 202445]
